alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 2:47PM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21 possible. * WHERE...Gilchrist County. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM Saturday to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
